value.title: StarCraft 2: Reynor's 100 PROBE Economy! (Skillous vs Reynor)
value.excerpt: Professional game of StarCraft 2 between Reynor (Protoss) and Skillous (Protoss). In this long game of PvP we watch two pro players play a wildly different style. Skillous tries to max out with Carriers, Archons and a Mothership, whereas Reynor puts a heavy focus on Zealots, Stalkers and Dark Templar.
